org.springframework.batch.item

Interface ItemStreamWriter<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ItemStream, ItemWriter<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ResourceAwareItemWriterItemStream<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFileItemWriter, AbstractItemStreamItemWriter, AsyncItemWriter, CompositeItemWriter, FlatFileItemWriter, JsonFileItemWriter, MultiResourceItemWriter, StaxEventItemWriter

    public interface ItemStreamWriter<T>
extends ItemStream, ItemWriter<T>
    Convenience interface that combines ItemStream and ItemWriter .
    Author:
    Dave Syer
